name: Little Miss Sunshine
tagline: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

name: Predator
tagline: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.

name: Secretariat
tagline: Penny Chenery Tweedy and colleagues guide her long-shot but precocious stallion to set, in 1973, the unbeaten record for winning the Triple Crown.

name: Son of God
tagline: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

name: The Dictator
tagline: The heroic story of a dictator who risks his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

name: Gothika
tagline: Ghost story in which a repressed female psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the very asylum where she worked with no memory of why she is there and what she has done.

name: The Last Boy Scout
tagline: A down and out cynical detective teams up with a down and out ex-quarterback to try and solve a murder case involving a pro football team and a politician.

name: The Stepford Wives
tagline: What does it take to become a Stepford wife, a woman perfect beyond belief? Ask the Stepford husbands, who've created this high-tech terrifying little town, in a very modern comedy-thriller.

name: Love Actually
tagline: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
tagline: A Navy navigator is shot down over enemy territory and is ruthlessly pursued by a secret police enforcer and the opposing troops. Meanwhile his commanding officer goes against orders in an attempt to rescue him.

name: Hellboy
tagline: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

name: Courage Under Fire
tagline: A US Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

name: Dawn of the Dead
tagline: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

name: Total Recall
tagline: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

name: Surf's Up
tagline: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

name: Chariots of Fire
tagline: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

name: Bride Wars
tagline: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

name: Water for Elephants
tagline: A veterinary student abandons his studies after his parents are killed and joins a traveling circus as their vet.

name: Honey I Blew Up the Kid
tagline: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

name: Jack
tagline: Because of an unusual aging disorder that has aged him four times faster than a normal human being, a boy enters the fifth grade for the first time with the appearance of a 40 year old man.

name: Sea of Love
tagline: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

name: HouseSitter
tagline: Con artist Gwen moves into Newton's empty house without his knowledge, and begins setting up house posing as his new wife.

name: Death Becomes Her
tagline: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

name: Easy A
tagline: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

name: Curious George
tagline: Will Ferrell stars as The Man in the Yellow Hat, a gentleman who looks after his pet monkey - an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

name: Open Range
tagline: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

name: RoboCop
tagline: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy - a loving husband, father and good cop - is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

name: Anastasia
tagline: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family hooks up with two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

name: Halloween
tagline: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution (where he was committed as a 10 year old) and he immediately returns to Haddonfield, where he wants to find his baby sister, Laurie. Anyone who crosses his path is in mortal danger.

name: LiTTLEMAN
tagline: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
tagline: A day-dreamer escapes his anonymous life by disappearing into a world of fantasies filled with heroism, romance and action. When his job along with that of his co-worker are threatened, he takes action in the real world embarking on a global journey that turns into an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.

name: Bicentennial Man
tagline: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

name: Ali
tagline: A biography of sports legend, Muhammad Ali, from his early days to his days in the ring.

name: Without a Paddle
tagline: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood promise by going on a camping expedition for the lost D.B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

name: Demolition Man
tagline: A cop is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent enemy who is loose in a nonviolent future society.

name: Step Up 2: The Streets
tagline: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

name: The Lincoln Lawyer
tagline: A defense attorney has a crisis of conscience when he represents a wealthy client who has a foolproof plan to beat the system.

name: Throw Momma from the Train
tagline: A bitter ex-husband. A put upon momma's boy. Both want their respective spouse and mother dead, but who will pull it off?

name: Shall We Dance
tagline: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

name: Red Eye
tagline: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in offing a politician.

name: U.S. Marshals
tagline: US Marshal Samuel Gerard (Jones) and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan (Snipes), a murderer and robber.

name: Invincible
tagline: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

name: Cleopatra
tagline: Historical epic. The triumphs and tragedy of the Egyptian queen, Cleopatra.

name: Takers
tagline: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

name: The Benchwarmers
tagline: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

name: The Chronicles of Riddick
tagline: 5 years after Pitch Black, the wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

name: Life Is Beautiful
tagline: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.

name: The Cider House Rules
tagline: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

name: Boyz n the Hood
tagline: Saga of a group of childhood friends growing up in a Los Angeles ghetto.

name: Pet Sematary
tagline: Behind a young family's home in Maine is a terrible secret that holds the power of life after death. When tragedy strikes, the threat of that power soon becomes undeniable.

name: Dragnet
tagline: The equally-straight-laced and "by the book" nephew of Joe Friday must work with his more laid-back partner to solve a mystery.

name: Moulin Rouge!
tagline: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets in this stylish musical, with music drawn from familiar 20th century sources.

name: Blood Diamond
tagline: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

name: The Specialist
tagline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
The Godfather: Part II
tagline: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.

name: Willow
tagline: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

name: The Whole Nine Yards
tagline: Nick is a struggling dentist in Canada. A new neighbor moves in, and he discovers that it is Jimmy "The Tulip" Teduski. His wife convinces him to go to Chicago and inform the mob boss who wants Jimmy dead.

name: Next Friday
tagline: Uncle Elroy and Day Day owe money on taxes so Craig finds a way to steal from the next door neighbors to pay off the taxes so Uncle Elroy's house doesn't get put up for auction.

name: Beethoven
tagline: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but its veterinarian secretly wants to kill him.

name: Beaches
tagline: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

name: Escape from Planet Earth
tagline: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
tagline: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

name: Shanghai Noon
tagline: Jackie Chan plays a Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

name: Twelve Monkeys
tagline: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

name: The Man in the Iron Mask
tagline: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother who he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

name: Midnight in Paris
tagline: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

name: Saw V
tagline: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman, the final apprentice to the serial killer is deigned a hero. Meanwhile, Agent Strahm continues to track Hoffman while another group of strangers are put through a series of gruesome traps.

name: American Reunion
tagline: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
tagline: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

name: A Civil Action
tagline: The families of children who died sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a tort so expensive to prove, the case could bankrupt their lawyer.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
tagline: Matt and Christina Drayton are a couple whose attitudes are challenged when their daughter brings home a fiancé who is black.

name: The Time Machine
tagline: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

name: 12 Years a Slave
tagline: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

name: Clueless
tagline: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

name: Rat Race
tagline: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

name: Tombstone
tagline: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

name: Drumline
tagline: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

name: Edward Scissorhands
tagline: An uncommonly gentle young man, who happens to have scissors for hands, falls in love with a beautiful adolescent girl.

name: Just Married

production.name: Mediastream Dritte Film GmbH & Co. Beteiligungs KG

tagline: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

name: A Knight's Tale
tagline: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

name: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
tagline: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

name: Primal Fear
tagline: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

name: 13 Going on 30
tagline: A 13 year old girl plays a game on her 13th birthday and wakes up the next day as a 30 year old woman.

name: ParaNorman
tagline: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

name: Romeo Must Die
tagline: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

name: White Noise
tagline: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
tagline: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

name: Be Cool
tagline: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

name: Friends with Benefits
tagline: While trying to avoid the clichés of Hollywood romantic comedies, Dylan and Jamie soon discover however that adding the act of sex to their friendship does lead to complications.

name: The Animal
tagline: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

name: Free Birds
tagline: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history - and get turkey off the holiday menu for good.

name: In Search of Noah's Ark
tagline: An investigation into the theory that Mt. Ararat in Turkey is the final resting place of Noah's Ark.

name: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
tagline: Hansel & Gretel are bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the fabled Blood Moon approaches, the siblings encounter a new form of evil that might hold a secret to their past.

name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
tagline: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.
